tasks.prompt:
Realistic Style: - [0-3s] Inside a modern shower with running water, a person reaches for a translucent shampoo bottle sitting on a tiled shelf.
- [3-7s] As the person flips the bottle, the liquid inside begins to glow and swim like a trapped fish; when the cap opens, the shampoo launches out as a single, long pearly tentacle that circles the person's wrist several times before suddenly liquefying into a massive, expanding tidal wave of foam.
- [7-10s] The person stops shaking, looking down at their hand which is now overflowing with way too much shampoo, a look of mild annoyance on their face.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] An interior designer in a half-finished room holds a yellow tape measure, looking up at a high point on the wall and preparing to measure.
- [3-7s] As they pull the tape, the metal blade turns into a solid, glowing beam of yellow light that refuses to buckle, instead acting as a rigid pillar that lifts the designer off their feet toward the ceiling until the tape suddenly liquefies and pulls them back down into the tiny casing.
- [7-10s] The designer flinches, shaking their hand slightly from the vibration and looking frustratedly at the retracted tape measure.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] In a brightly lit kitchen, a cook stands over a stove, gripping the handle of a black frying pan containing a sizzling omelet.
- [3-7s] As the cook jerks the pan upward, the omelet shapeshifts into a dozen small, golden-feathered birds that flutter frantically in a circle before colliding mid-air and dissolving into a heavy, viscous liquid that pours back into the pan.
- [7-10s] The cook freezes, staring down at the ruined shape of the food with a sigh of frustration.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] Close-up of a person's forearm resting on a wooden table; a small black ant is seen crawling onto the wrist from the table surface.
- [3-7s] The person notices the sensation and tries to flick the ant, but their finger passes through the ant's body like smoke, while the ant leaves a trail of glowing, molten ink that melts directly into the person's pores.
- [7-10s] The person rubs their arm where the ant was, looking at the spot with a slight grimace of discomfort.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A young woman stands in a narrow library aisle, looking up at a leather-bound book perched on the highest shelf.
- [3-7s] As she pulls the book by its spine, the neighboring volumes instantly liquefy into a thick, swirling waterfall of black ink and fluttering paper that pours off the shelf in a chaotic, supernatural cascade.
- [7-10s] The woman stands amidst the fallen books on the floor, holding her single book and looking around guiltily at the mess.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A man is driving a car on a highway during the late afternoon; the sun is hidden behind a large cloud, casting a soft light.
- [3-7s] As the car turns, the sun emerges and begins to melt like liquid gold, pouring physically through the glass windshield; the man frantically flips down the visor to deflect the glowing, viscous light away from his eyes.
- [7-10s] With the glare blocked, the man relaxes his face and continues driving safely, the golden sunlight reflecting off the dashboard.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A focused office worker sits at a desk, aligning a thick stack of papers and reaching toward a heavy-duty stapler.
- [3-7s] As the worker presses down, the stapler's top half transforms into a pair of rowdy, metallic jaws that begin rhythmically chewing the stack of papers, emitting a wet, grinding sound.
- [7-10s] The worker lets go, sighs in frustration, and tries to pry the jammed staple out with their fingernail.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A focused percussionist in a formal tuxedo stands in an orchestra pit, holding a metal beater, staring intensely at the sheet music while a triangle hangs from a stand in front of him.
- [3-7s] The percussionist strikes the triangle, but upon impact, the metal liquifies into a shimmering ripple of silver light that expands outward like a wave in a pond, distorting the air before snapping back into a solid shape.
- [7-10s] The percussionist gently dampens the vibrating metal with his fingers to stop the sound and exhales a breath of relief, looking satisfied with the performance.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A rustic, golden-brown bread loaf sits on a wooden cutting board; a person reaches out their hands toward it but hasn't gripped it yet.
- [3-7s] As the person pulls the loaf, the bread doesn't tear but stretches like glowing, viscous rubber; the golden crust begins to wheeze and expand like an accordion bellows, emitting a loud, melodic musical chord instead of a cracking sound.
- [7-10s] The person holds the two torn halves, looking down at the steam rising from the soft interior and the mess of crumbs they created.

Realistic Style: - [0-3s] A person stands in a sun-drenched room, squinting and shielding their eyes from the intense light hitting the window.
- [3-7s] The person reaches into the air and grasps the solid beam of sunlight, peeling it away from the glass like a sheet of sticky film to reveal the dark curtain already waiting underneath.
- [7-10s] The room dims significantly; the person lets go of the fabric and sighs in relief, standing in the shadow.
